mapper.insert: insert into member (id, name, password, email, birthday, address, gender, phone) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{gender}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update into member set (id, name, password, email, birthday, address, gender, phone) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{gender}, #{phone})
